pageTitle: Re: Photographer faces law suit: News & Rumors Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   In the OP's referenced story, the photographer declined to shoot the commitment ceremony for a lesbian couple because of conflicts with her Christian faith.  That faith would also take a dim view of telling a lie to avoid taking on a distasteful job. Agreed. I just don't understand why the photographer wouldn't simply say "sorry, I'm not available that day, but I can recommend X Y Z photographer in the area". Leave it at that. No reason, no complication. Why one would insist on hiring a photographer who obviously wouldnt perform his best is beyond me. mgblack74 wrote:
